string.value: Before asking #p1002101# to take you to the Island, prepare some #t4032470# to give him as a gift. The #t4032470# is sold by #b#p1081100##k in #b#m110000000##k.

#p1081100# says that #t4032470# is difficult to make and that she will make you some #t4032470# if you bring her the ingredients and pay her for the labor...

#i4000136# #t4000136# #b#c4000136# / 5#k
#i4000029# #t4000029# #b#c4000029# / 30#k
#i4000044# #t4000044# #b#c4000044# / 30#k
#b60000 mesos#k
Welcome to #m110000000#. I hope you enjoy your stay. Yes? Is there anything I can do for you? Oh, #t4032470#? I'm all sold out of that.
#t4032470# takes a lot of time and energy to make, so we don't always have enough.

But if you really, really want some #t4032470#, I have a special offer for you! If you pay a service fee and bring me the necessary ingredients to make #t4032470#, I'll be more than glad to make some for you. What do you say?
Wow, I've never met anyone who wanted #t4032470# so badly! Now then, please find #b5 #t4000136#s#k, #b30 #t4000029#s#k, and #b30 #t4000044#s#k. Oh, and I almost forgot! The fee is #b60000 mesos#k.
You don't want it that badly, huh? Yeah, not many people choose to go through all that for a drink.
Did you bring me the ingredients? Let me have them. I just have to peel the #t4000136#s, dice the fruit, ripen the #t4000029#s, and put a few #t4000044#s in for kick...
Tada! Here is the #t4032470#. I hope you enjoy it!

You haven't found all the ingredients for #t4032470#? #b5 #t4000136#s#k, #b30 #t4000029#s#k, #b30 #t4000044#s#k, and a fee of #b60000 mesos#k. That's all you need! Minus the mesos, you can find all of the ingredients right here in #m110000000#.
